EmailTemplate.name: Documentation Completed
EmailTemplate.subject: Documentation Completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}
Thank you for registering on the Hirect App and providing documents to get your profile up and running. The Hirect team is glad to inform you that your profile has successfully been sent for auditing.
Your profile is under review for verification, which will take 30 to 45 working minutes to update. We request you to get back on the Hirect App after 45 working minutes to check. You can now choose the best fit talent from a candidate pool of over 3M+ job seekers.
We look forward to having you on the Hirect App! Happy Hiring! Best wishes Team Hirect.
